message: PDF extracted and project created successfully

project.title: Brand Identity Project Brief
project.description: Tech startup disrupting e-commerce with AI-powered recommendations needs a complete brand identity ASAP for an investor pitch. The aesthetic should be modern, minimalist, and tech-forward, similar to Stripe, Notion, or Linear.
project.result: Complete brand identity system including logo, brand guidelines, and social media assets for an investor pitch.

ai_researched_costs.software_needed: Adobe Creative Cloud (Illustrator, InDesign), Figma Professional, Brandpad (optional for guidelines)
ai_researched_costs.equipment_requirements: High-resolution monitor (99% sRGB), Mid-spec MacBook Pro or equivalent PC (16GB RAM), Graphics Tablet (optional)

market_research.comparable_rates: Upwork Cambodia Mid-Level: $20-$35/hr; Local Agencies (Phnom Penh): $50-$100/hr; Junior Local Freelancers: $10-$15/hr.

adjustments.reason: Standardized rate for a mid-market freelance designer in Phnom Penh with 3-5 years experience.
Tech startup aesthetic (Stripe/Linear style) requires high-precision typography and grid systems, increasing technical difficulty.
Startup status is neutral; while they have tighter budgets, the high stakes of an investor pitch demand full professional value.
21-day turnaround for a full identity system and collateral is considered a 'rush' project, requiring prioritized scheduling.

sources: Upwork Cambodia Freelancer Profiles (Mid-level Branding Specialists)
DesignRush Global Agency & Freelance Pricing Report 2025
SmartVAs Guide: How Much to Pay a Graphic Designer 2025
Adobe Southeast Asia (Pricing for Creative Cloud Individual Plans)
pricing.disclaimer: This estimate reflects market rates for a professional-grade tech brand identity in Cambodia as of 2026. While the client budget is $1000, the scope and urgency justify a $1650 valuation. Negotiation may be required to align scope with the $1000 budget.
